findings.title: Skill does not specify a license
findings.description: Skill manifest does not include a 'license' field. Specifying a license helps users understand usage terms.
findings.remediation: Add 'license' field to SKILL.md frontmatter (e.g., MIT, Apache-2.0)

findings.title: Code executes bash but Bash tool not in allowed-tools
findings.description: Skill restricts tools to ['mcp__cdk__*', 'mcp__aws-mcp__*', 'mcp__awsdocs__*', 'Bash(cdk *)', 'Bash(npm *)', 'Bash(npx *)', 'Bash(aws cloudformation *)', 'Bash(aws sts get-caller-identity)'] but code executes bash commands
findings.remediation: Add 'Bash' to allowed-tools or remove bash execution from code

findings.title: Code uses search/grep patterns but Grep tool not in allowed-tools
findings.description: Skill restricts tools to ['mcp__cdk__*', 'mcp__aws-mcp__*', 'mcp__awsdocs__*', 'Bash(cdk *)', 'Bash(npm *)', 'Bash(npx *)', 'Bash(aws cloudformation *)', 'Bash(aws sts get-caller-identity)'] but code uses regex search patterns
findings.remediation: Add 'Grep' to allowed-tools or remove regex search operations

findings.title: INJECTION ATTACK detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects embedded scripting payloads (JS, VBScript, etc.) in MCP tool descriptions: template
findings.snippet: # - CloudFormation template size and resource count checks
findings.remediation: Review and remove injection attack pattern
